profile:
City Vacuum located on 815 major Mackenzie DR east unit 12  in Richmond Hill Ontario  offers central Vacuum systems such as CycloVac and CanaVac. City Vacuum also provides repair service for all types of vacuum systems.

Alarm Systems with or without cameras are also available and they come with installation.

Free price estimate on your repair unit or on your new project.

City Vacuum is also open on Saturdays and Sundays.

Unit 12- 815 Major Mackenzie Drive East
Richmond Hill , Ontario
L4C 9X2
